com.freedomotic.nlp

Class CommandsNlpService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.freedomotic.api.AbstractConsumer
      • com.freedomotic.nlp.CommandsNlpService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BusConsumer

    public class CommandsNlpService
extends AbstractConsumer
    Listen for free-form (natural language) text commands on channel "app.commands.interpreter.nlp" and using NLP tools execute the most similar command that the framework has in memory. For example a speech recognition utility may return a free-form text that can be interpreted by this module as an executable command. Another example is a chat bot that executes text commands. It expects a command with the following properties
    • text = A_STRING
    It replies back if the received command cannot be interpreted, so you can send the command and expect a reply in a given timeout. Read the see section for more info.
    Author:
    Enrico Nicoletti
    See Also:
    BusService.send(com.freedomotic.reactions.Command)

      • findMostSimilarCommand

        public Command findMostSimilarCommand(String phrase)
                               throws NoResultsException
        Creates a similarity ranking between the string in input and the Commands registered in the system. Elements are ordered from the most similar (index zero) to the less similar. It allows elements with similarity equals to zero, so the first element may be not similar at all
        Parameters:
        phrase - The text representing a natural language command
        Returns:
        a ranking of of commands similarity
        Throws:
        NoResultsException
